snippet: The countries have agreed on the broad principle that Serbs in a Serbian-majority area in northern Kosovo would gain more powers and tacitly recognize Kosovo’s government.
abstract: Talks aimed at overcoming ethnic enmities between Serbia and its former province Kosovo end without agreement, as two countries struggle to negotiate deal that will enhance regional stability and help clear way for their eventual membership in European Union.
lead_paragraph: The countries have agreed on the broad principle that Serbs in a Serbian-majority area in northern Kosovo would gain more powers and tacitly recognize Kosovo’s government.

headline.seo: No Deal Yet in Serbia and Kosovo Talks to Ease Tensions
headline.main: No Deal Yet in Talks to Reduce Strife Between Serbia and Kosovo
headline.print_headline: No Deal Yet in Serbia and Kosovo Talks to Reduce Strife
